org.bladerunnerjs.model

Interface SourceModule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Asset, LinkedAsset
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AugmentedContentSourceModule, CommonJsSourceModule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AliasCommonJsSourceModule, DefaultCommonJsSourceModule, NamespacedJsSourceModule, ServiceCommonJsSourceModule, ThirdpartySourceModule

    public interface SourceModule
extends LinkedAsset
    A source file, typically JavaScript (.js) files that live in a 'src' directory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      java.util.List<AssetLocation> assetLocations() 
      java.util.List<Asset> getPostExportDefineTimeDependentAssets(BundlableNode bundlableNode)
      Returns the list of dependencies that happen to be required at define-time, but which are not needed for the source-module to actually define itself.
      java.util.List<Asset> getPreExportDefineTimeDependentAssets(BundlableNode bundlableNode)
      Returns the list of all dependencies required by the source-module before it's able to define itself.
      java.util.List<Asset> getUseTimeDependentAssets(BundlableNode bundlableNode)
      Returns the list of dependencies that are known not to be needed by the source-module until use-time.

      boolean isGlobalisedModule()
